_sText:
mg_smash_desert_fix Re-uploaded the map to include the .bak file... it didnt inject the song as intended, so please include the new .bak file as well in your server files.
This is an fix of one of PettZon's maps.
Original description: Map Notes Survive the pyramids wrath for 210 seconds (3 Â½ minutes) To get to the fighting arena.
 My Notes Could not find the original song when I de-compiled the map, so I added a different song. also optimized the map a bit with regards to the logic of the cannon, so it should be smoother for your servers. A No-Block script is highly recommended for this type of map. Other than that, all props should go to PettZon for making this map.
 Come see this map and many, many more on our server:
Server IP address: sumocow.no-ip.org:27015
MaD cOw Server Website
